recipe.title: Hardy Greens With Lemon-Garlic Vinaigrette
ingredients: 4 cups torn turnip greens, beet greens, and/or kale
instructions: Whisk garlic, oil, lemon zest, lemon juice, and honey in a large bowl; season vinaigrette with salt and pepper.
Add collard greens and turnip greens to vinaigrette and toss to coat. Add half of cranberries, season with salt and pepper, and toss again to combine.
Top salad with remaining cranberries just before serving.
